byline.original: By RICHARD FAUSSET, ALAN BLINDER and MANNY FERNANDEZ

abstract: David Brown, Dallas's African-American police chief, has helped to ease tensions in aftermath of deadly police shooting, offering words of support to both protesters and police during his many public appearances; has maintained national reputation as reformer focused on defusing tensions between police and blacks and other minorities.

headline.print_headline: Chief of Police Is Face of Calm in Dallas Crisis
headline.main: Dallas Police Chief, David O. Brown, Is Calm at Center of Crisis

keywords.value: Dallas, Tex, Shooting of Police Officers (2016)
keywords.name: subject

snippet: In the aftermath of the police shootings in Dallas, Chief Brown’s public appearances have helped ease tensions in the city and the nation....
lead_paragraph: In the aftermath of the police shootings in Dallas, Chief Brown’s public appearances have helped ease tensions in the city and the nation.
